properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where ProcessCommandLine contains "Invoke-ATHRemoteFXvGPUDisablementCommand" or ProcessCommandLine contains "Invoke-ATHRemoteFXvGPUDisableme"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects calls to the AtomicTestHarnesses "Invoke-ATHRemoteFXvGPUDisablementCommand" which is designed to abuse the "RemoteFXvGPUDisablement.exe" binary to run custom PowerShell code via module load-order hijacking.
